ai-thag6.11:1.2_0: While staying in the forest grove
ai-thag6.11:1.3_0: you’ve entered a tough place for gathering alms—
ai-thag6.11:1.4_0: how will you get by, monk?”
ai-thag6.11:5.1_0: Those defilements that were found in me,
ai-thag6.11:5.3_0: are all cut off without remainder,
ai-thag6.11:6.1_0: The five aggregates are fully understood,
ai-thag6.11:6.2_0: they remain, but their root is cut.
ai-thag6.11:6.3_0: I have reached the end of suffering
ai-thag6.11:6.4_0: now there’ll be no more future lives.”
